Programming Tools


Modules

 rtiddsgen
 Generates source code from IDL data types.
 rtiddsping
 Sends or receives simple messages using RTI Data Distribution Service.
 rtiddsspy
 Debugging tool which receives all RTI Data Distribution Service communication.
